name: Detroit Style Pizza Dough
author: mookman288
description: Detroit style pizza is traditionally prepared in a square blue steel pan. Toppings are placed on top of the dough stretched to the edges. Cheese baked this way fries against the edges. This dough is the foundation of one eight-slice or two four-slice pizzas.
recipe: Combine and whisk &$0, &$1, and &$2 together in a stand mixer
Add &$3 and mix with a dough hook for two minutes until smooth
Add &$4 and mix with the dough
Knead on medium setting for 8 minutes
Hand knead on flour surface until pliable
Add &$5 to the pan and coat completely
Stretch dough into pan, cover, and let rest for 3 hours
